verses.verse: Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and they <S%H622>gathered<s%> to him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with him, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H9512>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great;<s%> and he <S%H7121>read<s%> in their <S%H241>hearing<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> which was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and His <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> and His <S%H2708>statutes<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> [his] <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> [his] <S%H5315>soul,<s%> to <S%H6965>carry<s%> out the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that were <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>entered<s%> into the <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H4932>second<s%> order and the <S%H8104>doorkeepers,<s%> <S%H5592><s%> to <S%H3318>bring<s%> out of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> for <S%H842>Asherah,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and he <S%H8313>burned<s%> them <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of the <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> and <S%H5375>carried<s%> their <S%H6083>ashes<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

And he <S%H7673>did<s%> <S%H7673>away<s%> with the <S%H3649>idolatrous<s%> <S%H3649>priests<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H5414>appointed<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H4524>surrounding<s%> <S%H4524>area<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> also those who <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> to the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and to the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and to the <S%H4208>constellations<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And he <S%H3318>brought<s%> out the <S%H842>Asherah<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> it at the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> and <S%H1854>ground<s%> [it] to <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and <S%H7993>threw<s%> its <S%H6083>dust<s%> on the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of the <S%H1121>common<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

He also <S%H5422>broke<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the [male] <S%H6945>cult<s%> <S%H6945>prostitutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> were <S%H707>weaving<s%> <S%H1004>hangings<s%> for the <S%H842>Asherah.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> from the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H2930>defiled<s%> the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense,<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> to <S%H884>Beersheba;<s%> and he <S%H5422>broke<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] on one's <S%H8040>left<s%> at the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

<S%H389>Nevertheless<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> did not <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> but they <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

He also <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H8612>Topheth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> might make his <S%H1121>son<s%> or his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire<s%> for <S%H4432>Molech.<s%>

And he <S%H7673>did<s%> <S%H7673>away<s%> with the <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> at the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> by the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of Nathan-melech the <S%H5631>official,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] in the <S%H6503>precincts;<s%> and he <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And the <S%H4196>altars<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] on the <S%H1406>roof,<s%> the <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>chamber<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and the <S%H4196>altars<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5422>broke<s%> <S%H5422>down;<s%> and he <S%H7323>smashed<s%> them <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H7993>threw<s%> their <S%H6083>dust<s%> into the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron.<s%>

And the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] on the <S%H3225>right<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H4889>destruction<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H9441>Ashtoreth<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> and for <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and for <S%H4445>Milcom<s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>

And he <S%H7665>broke<s%> in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> the [sacred] <S%H4676>pillars<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down<s%> the <S%H842>Asherim<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H4725>places<s%> with <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H6106>bones.<s%>

<S%H1571>Furthermore,<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that [was] at <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> [and] the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> that <S%H4196>altar<s%> and the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> he <S%H5422>broke<s%> <S%H5422>down.<s%> Then he <S%H7665>demolished<s%> its stones, <S%H1854>ground<s%> them to <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H842>Asherah.<s%>

Now when <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6437>turned,<s%> he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6913>graves<s%> that [were] <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> from the <S%H6913>graves<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> [them] on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H2930>defiled<s%> it according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimed,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H6725>monument<s%> that I <S%H7200>see<s%>?" And the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> him, "It is the <S%H6913>grave<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5117>"Let<s%> him <S%H5117>alone;<s%> let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5128>disturb<s%> his <S%H6106>bones.<s%>" So they <S%H4422>left<s%> his <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H4422>undisturbed<s%> with the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

And <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3707>provoking<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and he <S%H6213>did<s%> to them <S%H3605>just<s%> <S%H4639><s%> as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H2076>slaughtered<s%> on the <S%H4196>altars<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> on them; then he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6213>"Celebrate<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>"

<S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H6453>Passover<s%> had not been <S%H6213>celebrated<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

But in the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6453>Passover<s%> was <S%H6213>observed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover,<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H1197>removed<s%> the <S%H178>mediums<s%> and the <S%H3049>spiritists<s%> and the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%> and the <S%H1544>idols<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> that were <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that he might <S%H6965>confirm<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which were <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> that <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And <S%H6440>before<s%> him there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> him <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3966>might,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> did any <S%H3644>like<s%> him <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

<S%H389>However,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> did not <S%H7725>turn<s%> from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of His <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> His <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3708>provocations<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had <S%H3707>provoked<s%> Him.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> from My <S%H6440>sight,<s%> as I have <S%H5493>removed<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And I will <S%H3988>cast<s%> <S%H3988>off<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> and the <S%H1004>temple<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> 'My <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8033>there.<s%>'"

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H1697>Chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>?

In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H6549>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6549>Neco<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%> And <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him, and when [Pharaoh Neco] <S%H7200>saw<s%> him he <S%H4191>killed<s%> him at <S%H4023>Megiddo.<s%>

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7392>drove<s%> his <S%H4191>body<s%> in a <S%H7392>chariot<s%> from <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his own <S%H6900>tomb.<s%> Then the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him and <S%H4427>made<s%> him <S%H4427>king<s%> in <S%H8478>place<s%> of his father.

<S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> was <S%H7969>twenty-three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> three <S%H2320>months<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and his mother's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H2537>Hamutal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>
